Plot: Emma, Ravi, and Zuri Ross head off to a rustic summer camp in Maine, where their parents met as teens. Along with their new friends, love triangle,and the fears of the Kikiwaka. The trio tries their best to settle into their exciting and challenging new lives at Camp Kikiwaka.
Title: Bunk'd
Actors: Peyton List, Karan Brar, Skai Jackson, Miranda May
